Installation details

ECTSimv2 Matlab version package contains:
  • folders with classes
  • examples: ECT_big_model.m, ECT_small_model.m, test_model.m
  • csvd package (Copyright (c) 2008, Per Christian Hansen)
  • GUI (MATLAB's figures and m-files)

Requirements:

  • MATLAB (ECTSimv2 was testing on MATALB r2010a)
  • You need to have Image Processing Toolbox
  • 3GB RAM recommended

Installation:

  • download MATLAB version of ECTSimv2 from http://www.ectsim.ire.pw.edu.pl/
  • extract ECTSimv2 package to your work directory
  • add folder to MATLAB's path
  • run test_model.m
